Text.Language: Twbh m~Po#c# e~h~r/i e~jwn: w~ piaylovoroc m~marturoc: abba Carapamwn pie~pickopoc: n~tef ,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray to the Lord on our behalf, O struggle mantled martyr, Abba Sarapamon the Bishop, that He may forgive us our sins.
